T04nagyuksu:0: atha yuktiṣaṣṭikārikā nāma mañjuśrikumārabhutāya namaḥ namastasmai munīndrāya pratītyopādadeśine
T04nagyuksu:5: nirvartyate yathā yuktayā bhāvo 'pi śrvavaṇaṃ kuru || Yukti_2
T04nagyuksu:7: vimokṣastadabhāvena ko necchet kim na kārnāt || Yukti_3
T04nagyuksu:8: vimokṣo nāsti bhāvena bhāvo nāsti hyabhāvataḥ |
T04nagyuksu:10: nirvāṇam caiva lokaṃ ca manyante tattvadarśinaḥ |
T04nagyuksu:11: naiva lokaṃ na nirvānaṃ manyante tattvadarśinaḥ || Yukti_5
T04nagyuksu:12: nirvānaṃ ca bhavaścaiva dvayameva na vidyate |
T04nagyuksu:16: samskṛto na parijñāto nirodho vibhave sati |
T04nagyuksu:17: pratyakṣam bhūyate kasmin vibhavo jñāyate katham || Yukti_8
T04nagyuksu:19: yadā cāyaṃ niruddhaḥ syāttadā mokṣo bhavisyati || Yukti_9
T04nagyuksu:22: evam paśyati dharmaḥ yo nirvānam vā katam tathā |
T04nagyuksu:23: dharmajñānam paraṃ yatra bhedastu tatra vidyate || Yukti_11
T04nagyuksu:27: kutaḥ sampannabuddhaiśca tasyārambho na bhāṣitaḥ || Yukti_13
T04nagyuksu:29: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādastasya purvaṃ paraṃ vā kim || Yukti_14
T04nagyuksu:32: bhavatīdam yadā māyā namkṣyatīti tadaiva hi |
T04nagyuksu:34: yathā marīcikā māyā bhavam buddhayā hi paśyati |
T04nagyuksu:35: purvāntam vāparāntam vā na dṛṣṭayā parikliśyate || Yukti_17
T04nagyuksu:37: pratītyotpādacakreṇa vijānanti na te jagat || Yukti_18
T04nagyuksu:39: svayam yadā yadutpannamutpannam nāma tat katham || Yukti_19
T04nagyuksu:41: svabhāvena hi yatkṣīṇam tat kṣīṇamucyate katham || Yukti_20
T04nagyuksu:42: na kaścidanutpannam nirodho 'pi na vai tathā |
T04nagyuksu:57: satyanmṛṣetyuktamāryena tatra kā śiṣyate parā || Yukti_28
T04nagyuksu:69: tajjñānena viyukttena mṛṣaiva na vikalpitam || Yukti_34
T04nagyuksu:71: nāva śiṣṭam tadā satyamevam vijñena kalpitam || Yukti_35
T04nagyuksu:73: evambhūto bhavedyatra nā doṣo jāyate kathaṃ || Yukti_36
T04nagyuksu:77: ajñānato hi samkalpa iti kim na vidhīyate || Yukti_38
T04nagyuksu:78: hetutaḥ sambhavo yasya sthiti rna pratyayairvinā |
T04nagyuksu:81: tadaiva hi sthitā mārge na kaściditasmayastataḥ || Yukti_40
T04nagyuksu:83: kena vādena gṛhyante bhāvāḥ santi parā iti || Yukti_41
T04nagyuksu:85: idam satyamado veti paṇḍitaiḥ kathamucyatai || Yukti_42
T04nagyuksu:89: tatra liṅgādayo doṣāḥ prajāyante na vā kathaṃ || Yukti_44
T04nagyuksu:90: yān hi dharmānupādāya dṛṣṭaścandro jale yathā |
T04nagyuksu:91: tatra satyam mṛṣā naiva kāmaṃ dṛṣṭyā na hāritaḥ || Yukti_45
T04nagyuksu:94: sa hetuḥ sarvadṛṣṭīnām kleśotpatti rna tam vinā |
T04nagyuksu:100: mahātmanām na pakṣo vā vitarko vā na vidyate |
T04nagyuksu:101: yeṣām na vidyate pakṣeḥ parapakṣaḥ kutasteṣām || Yukti_50
T04nagyuksu:103: calaṃ vāniṣṭhitam cittaṃ na tiṣṭhatyanāśritam || Yukti_51
T04nagyuksu:104: sāśraya cittavāna sattveḥ kleśodbhūto viṣo mahān |
T04nagyuksu:105: sadā pṛthagajano hīnaḥ kleśasarpena gṛhītaḥ || Yukti_52
T04nagyuksu:106: prativimbe yathā rāgo loke ca mohavandhanāt |
T04nagyuksu:107: viṣayapinjaro sakto bālo hi satyasamjñayā || Yukti_53
T04nagyuksu:111: rūpasvabhāvavijño yo vimukto buddhimān paraḥ || Yukti_55
T04nagyuksu:117: arāge rāgavardhāste na sāśrayā mahātmanaḥ || Yukti_58
T04nagyuksu:120: śāstreṇānena janānām punyam jñānam ca sancitam |
T04nagyuksu:124: ca bhoṭavāsinā pātchava prāntīya suryakīrtirnāma bhoṭapaṇḍitena likhitaṃ bhoṭabhāṣāyamiti
